SELECT c.id, c.customer_name AS customerName, c.phone, c.id_card AS idNumber, c.address, c.manager_id AS managerId, u.nickname AS managerName, d.name AS orgName, c.family_members AS familyMembers, c.housing_type AS housingType, c.monthly_income AS monthlyIncome, c.create_time AS createTime, ST_X(c.location) AS latitude, ST_Y(c.location) AS longitude FROM grid_customer c LEFT JOIN system_users u ON c.manager_id = u.id AND u.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN system_dept d ON u.dept_id = d.id AND d.deleted = 0 WHERE c.deleted = 0 AND c.customer_type = 'COMMUNITY'
AND c.customer_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{customerName}, '%')
ORDER BY c.create_time DESC

SELECT c.id, c.customer_name AS customerName, c.phone, c.id_card AS idNumber, c.address, c.manager_id AS managerId, u.nickname AS managerName, d.name AS orgName, c.family_members AS familyMembers, c.housing_type AS housingType, c.monthly_income AS monthlyIncome, c.create_time AS createTime, ST_X(c.location) AS latitude, ST_Y(c.location) AS longitude FROM grid_customer c LEFT JOIN system_users u ON c.manager_id = u.id AND u.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN system_dept d ON u.dept_id = d.id AND d.deleted = 0 WHERE c.id = #{id} AND c.deleted = 0 AND c.customer_type = 'COMMUNITY'
